issue.title: Add a short call-to-action / how-to-get-involved to the main README.md
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-35](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-35). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Engage on the mailing list
- Read the format documentation
- Contribute code and design ideas to the reference implementations

comments.body:
